                ". Moreover, it is a language-neutral interface that allows programming languages (such as JavaScript) to access the HTML elements."
              ]
            ]
          },
          "space_id": "cf9fa7dd-b245-42a0-b929-d5a276b3afe0",
          "type": "text",
          "version": 5
        }
      },
